form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding An HIV Exposed Or Infected Child> HIV Exposed 12 – < 24 MONTHS OF AGE

field.name: Feeding an HIV Exposed Child 12 – < 24 months of Age | Counseling
If infant is not breastfeeding, give about 1 – 2 cups (500 mL) of full cream milk or formula per day
Give milk with a cup, not a bottle
If no milk is available give 4 – 5 feeds per day
Give 5 adequate servings of nutritious complementary foods OR family foods
If child is breastfed give adequate servings 3 times per day plus snacks
